description:
RealSimpleEDU.com brings you on-the-go learning and reference for Nursing

App offers quizzes and tutorials  to help you learn Nursing

App is continuously updated based on your feedback.Your 100% satisfaction is guaranteed.

App Tools include search .



Includes following tutorials:

Nursing Introduction,
Nursing Theories and Research,
Nursing Process,
Legal Aspects of Nursing,
Health Care Delivery System,
Community Based Nursing,
Values Ethics and Advocacy,
Life Span Development,
Assessment of Health,
Roles Basic to Nursing Care,
Integral Components of Patient Care,
Medication in Patients,
Perioperative Nursing,
Promoting Psychological Health,
Promoting Physiological Health.


Includes following quizzes:

Quiz on Introduction to Nursing ,
Quiz on Nursing Care and Values,
Quiz on Medications and Health Promotions in Patients .


Our Vision: Provide on-the-go references that enable our customers to refer, learn and remember; easy to learn, more engaging and most complete.

Our Mission: A RealSimpleEDU app in every pocket.

Please write to us. We would love to improve this app.
